vooga.towerdefense.action

Class TargetedAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.action.Action
      • vooga.towerdefense.action.TargetedAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplyAttributeBuff, FilterTargets, FindTargets, LaunchProjectile, ModifyAttributeValue, MoveToTarget, OnCollision, PeriodicAction, RemoveGameElement, ShootProjectile

    public abstract class TargetedAction
extends Action
    Actions that require a target or multiple targets. Allows targets to be set within the action.
    Author:
    XuRui
